publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1446.1 Mr Brian Monteith: Scottish Qualifications Authority-As an amendment to motion (S1M-1446) in the name of Alex Neil, insert at end "and as a result of the contents of these reports the Parliament calls for the resignation of Sam Galbraith as a member of the Scottish Executive."

S1M-1446.1 Scottish Qualifications Authority (lodged on 8 December 2000) Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*, Phil Gallie*, Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh*, Alex Johnstone*, Alex Fergusson*, Mr Jamie McGrigor*, David McLetchie*, Ben Wallace*, Mr David Davidson*, Mary Scanlon*, Mr Keith Harding*, Bill Aitken*
*S1M-1446.1 Mr Brian Monteith: Scottish Qualifications Authority: Withdrawn
